posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 导入github中的项目
posts.text: 准备 安装 homebrew shadowsocks + profixier 加速安装速度1/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" homebrew 安装 git 12345 brew install git``` * 设置变量 ``` bash git config --global user.name 'zz' 1git config --global user.email '656453@qq.com' 创建版本库 1234git init``` ``` bash ls -ah 导入项目 创建ssh key^liaoxuefeng 1ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail@example.com" 将公钥 Users/zz/.ssh/id_rsa.pub 登记在github的设置里 查看关联的远程库 12345git remote -v``` * 删除关联的远程库 ``` bash git remote rm origin 关联远程库 1git remote add origin git@github.com:zoo-keeper/leetcode.git 导入远程库 12345678git pull origin master``` ## 测试 ###在文件管理器修改/删除文件 * 提交到当前工作区 ``` bash git add . 提交到本地仓库 1git commit -m "注释" 提交到远程库 1git push origin master 引用
